properties.name: spring.persistent-tasks.poll-rate
properties.description: The interval at which the scheduler checks for new tasks in seconds.

properties.name: spring.persistent-tasks.max-threads
properties.description: The number of threads to use; default 10; set to 0 to disable task processing.

properties.name: spring.persistent-tasks.task-timeout
properties.description: The maximum time allowed for a task and scheduler to complete a task. Defaults to 5 minutes.

properties.name: spring.persistent-tasks.poll-task-timeout
properties.description: The interval at which the system checks for abandoned tasks, in seconds. Defaults to every 5 minutes.

properties.name: spring.persistent-tasks.history.delete-after
properties.description: The interval at which old triggers are deleted, in seconds. Defaults to every 72 hours.

properties.name: spring.persistent-tasks.scheduler-enabled
properties.description: Indicates whether this node should handle triggers.
